thread.title: Antonelli wins Moto3 Japan Grand Prix
thread.title_full: Antonelli wins Moto3 Japan Grand Prix - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Antonelli wins Moto3 Japan Grand Prix
text:
MOTEGI: Niccolo Antonelli grabbed his second career victory in the Moto3 category at the Japan Grand Prix on Sunday.
The Italian on Honda finished the race in 28min 3.391sec, followed by Portugal's Miguel Oliveira who came in 1.053sec later and Spain's Jorge Navarro who finished 8.529sec after Antonelli.
Championship leader Danny Kent settled for sixth, finishing 15.224sec after Antonelli.
The race was reduced to 13 laps from the 20 laps originally scheduled due to rain and fog that caused a two-hour delay of warm-up sessions in mountainous Motegi.
Very slight rain continued during the race itself.
"The start was perfect," said Antonelli, who started second on the grid.
"I had a fantastic feeling for my bike. A fantastic weekend," he said.
